member.name: KERB_LOGON_SUBMIT_TYPE
member.summary: The KERB_LOGON_SUBMIT_TYPE enumeration identifies the type of logon being requested.

member.name: KERB_LOGON_SUBMIT_TYPE.KerbSmartCardUnlockLogon
member.summary: Unlock a workstation using a smart card.

member.name: KERB_LOGON_SUBMIT_TYPE.KerbTicketLogon
member.summary: Logon using a valid Kerberos ticket as a credential.

member.name: KERB_LOGON_SUBMIT_TYPE.KerbTicketUnlockLogon
member.summary: Unlock a workstation by using a Kerberos ticket.

member.name: KERB_LOGON_SUBMIT_TYPE.KerbS4ULogon
member.summary: Perform a service for user logon.

member.name: KERB_LOGON_SUBMIT_TYPE.KerbCertificateLogon
member.summary: Logon interactively using a certificate stored on a smart card.

member.name: KERB_LOGON_SUBMIT_TYPE.KerbCertificateS4ULogon
member.summary: Perform a service for user logon using a certificate stored on a smart card.

member.name: KERB_LOGON_SUBMIT_TYPE.KerbCertificateUnlockLogon
member.summary: Unlock a workstation using a certificate stored on a smart card.
